content.query:
SELECT TOP (100) [Name]
,[age]
 FROM [rr].[temp]

 Alter table [rr].[temp]
 Add ID integer NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY   

 Create table temp_test
 (ID int NOT NULL ,
 [Name] varchar(50)
,[age] INt
 )

ALTER TABLE temp_test
ADD CONSTRAINT PK_id PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED (ID) NOT ENFORCED;


INSERT into temp_test
 VALUES(2,'Savinda',40)
